meanings.definition: Having three unequal axes at right angles.
meanings.sent1: The orthorhombic room had walls of different lengths meeting at perfect right angles.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the orthorhombic crystal structure under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The orthorhombic garden had a quirky shape with paths of varying lengths intersecting at right angles.
meanings.sent4: Her orthorhombic personality had different facets that perfectly aligned in unique ways.
meanings.sent5: The orthorhombic building stood out with its distinct angles and varying lengths.
